results.title: For you madam. [No. 68/04] = Pour vous madame
results.brief_description: Cinemagazine items: French nursery schools are an extension of the home and the family; The International Cultural Federation has organised its 14th exhibition at the Paris Museum of Modern Art; A wonderful collection of jewels by the famous painter Braque; The waterfall in the Bois de Boulogne in Paris is the background for a collection of rainwear.
